name: Calamares
body:
### Welcome to the Calamares web presence.
This project started as a desire of several independent Linux Distribution to come together and work on one universal Installer.  Instead of everyone working on their own implementation, why not work together on something that can be used by many?

![example_image](http://wstaw.org/m/2014/10/16/snapshot145.png)

### Design
To make this installer as modular as possible, the framework is based on Qt 5 and python 3.  For partitioning, parts of the all new KDE frameworks are in use (also Qt 5 based).

### Video Demo:  
<http://kaosx.us/media/cala_web.webm>
